org.jclouds.joyent.sdc.v6_5.features

Interface MachineAsyncClient


  • public interface MachineAsyncClient
    Provides asynchronous access to Machine via their REST API.

    Author:
    Gerald Pereira
    See Also:
    MachineClient, api doc
